title: Trust Funds/Vacancy Relief and Risk Mitigation Trust Fund
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Trust Funds/Vacancy Relief and Risk Mitigation Trust Fund;  Creating the Vacancy Relief and Risk Mitigation Trust Fund within the Florida Housing Finance Corporation for a specified purpose; authorizing any unexpended balance at a specified time to revert and be reappropriated for a certain purpose; providing for future review and termination or re-creation of the trust fund, etc.
